2K2.1.title: Unlawful Receipt, Possession, or Transportation of Firearms or Ammunition;

baseOffenseQuestions.text: Did the offense involve a semiautomatic firearm capable of accepting a large capacity magazine OR a firearm described in 26 U.S.C. § 5845(a)?
Did the defendant commit any part of the instant offense subsequent to sustaining at least two felony convictions of either a crime of violence or a controlled substance offense?

yesResult.description: Special firearm with 2+ prior felony convictions

baseOffenseQuestions.text: Did the defendant commit any part of the instant offense subsequent to sustaining at least two felony convictions of either a crime of violence or a controlled substance offense?
Did the defendant commit any part of the instant offense subsequent to sustaining one felony conviction of either a crime of violence or a controlled substance offense?

yesResult.description: Special firearm with 1 prior felony conviction

baseOffenseQuestions.text: Did the defendant commit any part of the instant offense subsequent to sustaining one felony conviction of either a crime of violence or a controlled substance offense?

Did the offense involve a semiautomatic firearm capable of accepting a large capacity magazine OR a firearm described in 26 U.S.C. § 5845(a) AND the defendant was either: (1) a prohibited person at time of offense, (2) convicted under 18 U.S.C. § 922(d), § 932, or § 933, or (3) convicted under 18 U.S.C. § 922(a)(6) or § 924(a)(1)(A) with knowledge/intent/reason to believe the offense would result in transfer to a prohibited person?

yesResult.description: Special firearm with prohibited person circumstances

baseOffenseQuestions.text: Did the offense involve a firearm described in 26 U.S.C. § 5845(a)?

Was the defendant either: (1) a prohibited person at time of offense, (2) convicted under 18 U.S.C. § 922(d), § 932, or § 933, or (3) convicted under 18 U.S.C. § 922(a)(6) or § 924(a)(1)(A) with knowledge/intent/reason to believe the offense would result in transfer to a prohibited person?
Is the defendant convicted under 18 U.S.C. § 922(c), (e), (f), (m), (s), (t), or (x)(1), or 18 U.S.C. § 1715?

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: How many firearms were involved in the offense?
Did the defendant possess all ammunition and firearms solely for lawful sporting purposes or collection, and did not unlawfully discharge or otherwise unlawfully use such firearms or ammunition?
specificOffenseCharacteristics.condition: Does not apply to defendants subject to subsection (a)(1), (a)(2), (a)(3), (a)(4), or (a)(5)

yesEffect.description: Decrease to level 6 for lawful sporting/collection purposes

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: What type of destructive device was involved in the offense?

options.label: Portable rocket, missile, or launching device

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: What applies to the firearms involved in the offense?

options.label: Any firearm had modified serial number (illegible/unrecognizable) OR defendant knew firearm lacked serial number

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: What applies regarding machinegun conversion devices? (Apply the greatest)

options.label: Possessed 4+ devices OR transferred/sold any device

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: What trafficking activity applies? (Apply the greatest)

options.label: Trafficked firearm/ammunition to prohibited person or for unlawful use
Trafficked 2+ firearms to person with violent/drug conviction, under criminal sentence, or for unlawful use

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Did the defendant possess/transfer firearms in connection with export from US or another felony offense?

yesEffect.description: Export or connection to another felony

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Did a recordkeeping offense reflect an effort to conceal a substantive firearms/ammunition offense?
specificOffenseCharacteristics.note: If yes, use the offense level for the substantive offense instead (requires manual calculation)

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Did the defendant receive a (b)(6) enhancement AND commit the offense in connection with participation in a criminal group of 5+ persons?
specificOffenseCharacteristics.condition: Only applies if defendant receives enhancement under subsection (b)(6)

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Does the defendant qualify for the vulnerable defendant reduction?
specificOffenseCharacteristics.condition: Only applies if: (1) receives (b)(6) enhancement, (2) has ≤1 criminal history point, and (3) was motivated by relationship/threats/fear OR unusually vulnerable due to physical/mental condition
